policy.please2: A valid bank card must be added to your account for security purposes. Your card will not be charged unless you choose to. You are able to top up your Hela Job Wallet at any time by going to Profile > Payment then press on add money to wallet.
policy.title: Hela Job Policies
policy.imp2: The money you will add to your wallet will be held in escrow and only be paid once the job is complete.
policy.imp3: By extending this hire and clicking the link below, the money for the work scheduled above will be held in escrow and only be paid once the job is complete.
policy.policy1: Each Job Seeker is going to be paid a minimum of 4 hours even if they have worked less than that. Therefore, ensure they work 4 or more hours
policy.policy4: All Hela Job Seekers must receive 20 minutes uninterrupted break after 6 hours of work and/or 30 minutes after 8 hours of work.
policy.policy6: By using Hela Job’s services, you agree with our Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy. Please visit our website to read our policies. You are advised not to use Hela Job’s services if you disagree with the policies in place.

ticket.title: Support Title
ticket.please: Please enter a title for you ticket
ticket.relatedTo: What is your ticket related to?

intro.text1: Use our built-in 'Job Posting' feature to post your booking and receive acceptance from Job Seekers instantly or schedule one in advance for Hela Job to post for you in the future.
intro.text2: Once you receive an acceptance to a Job Request, click on the 'Live Tracking' button to track whereabouts and how far your Job Seeker is from you.
intro.text3: Use our built-in chat feature to communicate with your Job Seeker and keep track of the messaging history.
intro.text4: Your Job Seeker will get paid only for the time they have logged in the app via Hela Job's QR code functionality.
intro.text5: Your business is important to us and therefore, once you pay the 4 hour policy deposit, it will go into Hela Job's escrow system and be paid to the Job Seeker only when they complete the assigned job.
intro.text6: Once you are about to complete a job, you will see the detailed breakdown of the particular job and validate & pay for hours completed in a single click.
intro.text7: Sharing is caring, Hela Job is better with friends. Invite your friends to download Hela Job now and have the chance to work at the same workplace together. Is this the new fun fun?
intro.question: Want to know more?
